original_text: But the man that shall touch them must be fenced with iron and the staff of a spear; and they shall be utterly burned with fire in the same place.
korean_text: 그것들을 만지는 자는 철과 창자루를 가져야 하리니 그것들이 당장에 불살리리로다 하니라

sentences.original_text: But the man that shall touch them
and the staff of a spear
and they shall be utterly burned with fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들은 불로 완전히 태워질 것이며
